name: Cro Magnon
description: Europe, 39000 BC. A group of people have arrived at a location suitable for a settlement. The lands are rich and fertile, but not uninhabited. You will take command of a newly formed clan of Cro Magnon, in the final days of the Neanderthals. Your goal is survival and dominance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
